                                                                                                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> otherGenes)
Map each gene to the collection of overlappers in another set

Parameters:
genes - The genes by chromosome
otherGenes - The other set by chromosome
Returns:
By chromosome: map of each gene that has overlappers in the other set to its overlappers

Get overlap between two gene sets and automatically exclude all genes in a set

Parameters:
genes - First gene set by chromosome
intersectGenes - Genes to intersect with by chromosome
excludeGenes - Exclude genes from first gene set if they overlap a gene from this set

getOverlapWithRandomizedPositions

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> getOverlapWithRandomizedPositions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> genes,
                                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> intersectGenes)
Intersect a set of genes with another set and randomize positions within each gene in the second set

Parameters:
genes - The genes of interest
intersectGenes - The genes to intersect with and randomize within
Returns:
Genes that have been intersected with the intersect set and then randomized within each intersect gene

getOverlapWithRandomizedPositions

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> getOverlapWithRandomizedPositions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> genes,
                                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> intersectGenes,
                                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<Gene>> excludeFeatures)
Intersect a set of genes with another set and randomize positions within each gene in the second set

Parameters:
genes - The genes of interest
intersectGenes - The genes to intersect with and randomize within
excludeFeatures - Do not consider genes that overlap one of these
Returns:
Genes that have been intersected with the intersect set and then randomized within each intersect gene

Get number of overlapping bases between two gene sets

Parameters:
genes - First gene set by chromosome
intersectGenes - Genes to intersect with by chromosome
Returns:
The total number of overlapping bases including double counts if multiple genes overlap the same gene

writeOverlap

public static void writeOverlap(java.lang.String geneFile,
                                java.lang.String intersectFile,
                                java.lang.String outFile,
                                boolean randomizePositionsWithinEachGene)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Get overlap between two gene sets specified in bed files and write to a file

Parameters:
geneFile - Bed file of first gene set
intersectFile - Bed file of genes to intersect with
outFile - Output bed file to write Genes representing the overlaps
randomizePositionsWithinEachGene - Whether to randomize the position of each overlap within the gene
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Get overlap between two gene sets specified in bed files, automatically excluding all genes in a set, and write to a file

Parameters:
geneFile - Bed file of first gene set
intersectFile - Bed file of genes to intersect with
excludeFile - Exclude genes from first gene set if they overlap a gene from this set
outFile - Output bed file to write Genes representing the overlaps
randomizePositionsWithinEachGene - Whether to randomize the position of each overlap within the gene
Throws:
java.io.IOException
